QuestData.Title: The Dark Heart of the Mogu
QuestData.Description: Dear $p,$b$bWe have always known the mogu to be dark and sinister. Your research however would imply that they are far worse.$b$bIf you visit us at the Seat of Knowledge in Vale of Eternal Blossoms we can add this contribution to your personal collection.$b$bThank you for your diligence!$b$bSincerely,$b$bLorewalker Cho
QuestData.LogDescription: Bring The Dark Heart of the Mogu to Lorewalker Cho at the Seat of Knowledge.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Speak with Lorewalker Cho at the Seat of Kowledge in the Vale of Eternal Blossoms.
